item.title: DJI Osmo Mobile 7P Review: Auto Tracking With Any Phone, Any App Is A Game-Changer
item.description: Gimbals are a dime a dozen, but one tiny module allows the DJI Osmo Mobile 7P to do more than any other.

item.title: First ‘Shrek 5’ Trailer Horrifies Some Fans
item.description: Here is the new Shrek 5 trailer, which stars Zendaya and is really not that good at all for being 15 years in the making.

item.title: Christie’s AI-Themed Art Auction: How Do We Know What Holds Value?
item.description: As buyers bid on art created with AI, the most valuable works will be those that design and challenge AI—not merely consume it.
